author: jboynes
msg: update spec API for proposal for adding getCallback and getCallbackReference to RequestContext

author: olegk
msg: HTTPCORE-42: Added HttpExpectationVerifier interface and updated all server side HTTP services to make use of this interface during the expect:100-continue handshake to verify whether incoming requests satisfy the target server's expectations

author: hlship
msg: Add support for "?." separator inside property expressions, which will abort the read or write if the indicated term is null.
Remove logging decorators from built-in services.
Switch the Grid component back to using an inner class for its computed model binding.

author: fhanik
msg: Add some options for handling URL chars, backport from TC 6.0.x
